# tui

> This readme is automatically generated by [create-ink-app](https://github.com/vadimdemedes/create-ink-app)

## Install

```bash
$ npm install --global tui
```

## CLI

```
$ tui --help

  Usage
    $ tui

  Options
    --name  Your name

  Examples
    $ tui --name=Jane
    Hello, Jane
```
